title: The Girl Who Cheered Me up Through a “Consultation App” After I Broke up With My Girlfriend of Three Years Was a Beautiful Girl Who Was Secretly One of My Classmates – Who Wouldn’t Fall in Love With Someone Who Told Them “I’ll Be There for You Until the Day I Die.”? - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Death of Loved Ones   Kind Love Interests   Male Protagonist
author: Aoki Fuyu   青季 ふゆ
description:
After a breakup with his girlfriend of three years, Hideto Hisayama, a man with a broken heart, calls a girl on a 'consultation app' in search of healing.

'Are you by any chance... Otoha?'

“Ehh!? Don’t tell me, Hisayama-kun?”

The other party is, of all people, the plain and unremarkable girl from his class, Yuuna Otoha!

“If you’re okay with it, would you like to talk about it at school?”

“Are you sure?”

“Of course. I can’t just leave someone feeling down.”

A relationship that began by coincidence, a one in 120 million chance.
Just a temporary relationship to offset my loneliness. Or at least, it was supposed to be.

“I’ll be there for you until the day I die.”

When Yuuna's kindness melted my frozen heart, I felt...>
